page.title: 02BUCKLOW FARM PLUMLY
page.content: WE LOOKED CLOSELY AT ONE OF THE FINE FARMS IN THE PLUMLEY AREA. IT IS OWNED BY A YOUNG MAN,JUST RECENTLY MARRIED AND HAS BEEN IN THE FAMILY SINCE 1920. THE CATTLE ARE BOUGHT IN AND FED ON CROPS GROWN AT THE FARM.A HELICOPTER IS HIRED TO SPRAY THE CROPS,BUT EVERYTHING ELSE IS DONE BY THE FARMER,APART FROM THE OCCASIONAL VISIT FROM THE VET.ALL THE MACHINERY IS SECOND-HAND,SELF-MAINTAINED AND VERY RELIABLE. THE FARM GROWS ALL THAT IS NEEDED IN THE FOOD-LINE,BUT THE FARMER WILL NOT EAT HIS OWN BEASTS. AN UNCLE LOOKS AFTER THE FARM WHEN THE FARMER GOES ON HOLIDAY,USUALLY ONCE A YEAR.
